item.title: American Bitcoin is expanding its Bitcoin mining operation from 10 EH/s to 24 EH/s.
item.description: September 4th. As per market information, American Bitcoin (stock code ABTC), a mining company with the support of the Trump family, is going to expand its Bitcoin mining operation from 10 EH/s to 24 EH/s, representing a 2.4-fold increase.

item.title: Ethereum's Net Staking Inflow Surpasses Net Withdrawal Outflow, Reaching a New High Since September 2023
item.description: September 4th. Based on the data from the Validator Queue Tracker website, the staking entry queue of the Ethereum PoS network exceeded the exit queue today. The current entry queue is 833,000 ETH, with an approximate value of $36.6 billion, while the current exit queue is 823,000 ETH, with an approximate value of $36.2 billion.It is worth noting that there has been a substantial increase in the staking demand from new validators on the Ethereum PoS network, reaching the highest level since September 2nd, 2023, at 860,000 ETH.BlockBeats Note: The line chart data is accurate as of yesterday.

item.title: Justin Sun: No Reason to Doubt High-Yield Staking, Interest Subsidized by Corporate Profits
item.description: On September 4th, Justin Sun responded to the inquiries regarding the "Huobi HTX High-Yield Financial Product" as follows:Similar to the popular instant rewards (free lunch) in the current industry, the high-yield interest rate is 100% subsidized by the group. This is essentially done to compete for users among trading platforms. The subsidy logic is also very straightforward: user growth leads to trading volume growth, which is worthwhile in the long run.Huobi HTX is still in the early stage of growth and will consider other factors after increasing asset immersion.The Merkel Tree proof has been released for nearly 34 months, ensuring fund transparency.The current group has an annual profit of tens of billions of US dollars. Therefore, no one should question our ability to subsidize, right?Finally, Justin Sun stated that there is no reason to question the Huobi HTX demand deposit financial product as funds can be withdrawn directly.

item.title: Solana Foundation-backed accelerator, Solaris, launches second batch admissions
item.description: On September 4th, the Solana Chinese community Solar, the developer education platform HackQuest, and Sonic SVM jointly launched the second season of the Solaris Accelerator. This accelerator is officially supported by the Solana Foundation and is intended to provide systematic growth and resource support to entrepreneurial teams in the Chinese-speaking community. Offline events will be held in Singapore, Shenzhen, Hong Kong, and other places.In the first season projects in 2025, a total of 7 teams graduated successfully, and 4 of them received follow-up funding. The second season will take place from September to December and will focus on supporting early-stage projects in areas such as the Internet Capital Market, Artificial Intelligence, and Payments.Mentors for this season's accelerator include the Solana Foundation Chairperson Lily Liu, the Jupiter co-founder Siong, the Backpack co-founder Cansun, the Kamino founder Mark, the Bybit Spot Head, the Byreal founder Emily, as well

item.title: Bybit is set to launch the NODE U Perpetual Contract
item.description: On September 4th, Bybit is going to launch the NODE U coin-margined perpetual contract.

item.title: Binance Alpha announces delay of the Gata (GATA) airdrop
item.description: September 4th. According to official channels, Binance has declared a postponement of the Gata (GATA) airdrop. The specific distribution time will be announced at a later date.Previously, Binance Alpha was set to list Gata (GATA), and Alpha trading was scheduled to commence on September 4, 2025, at 18:00 (UTC+8). After trading begins, users who hold at least 220 Binance Alpha Points will be able to claim 500 GATA tokens through an airdrop. The first come, first served principle applies.

item.title: An institution has accumulated 191,000 AAVE over the past 3 weeks, worth $61.03 million.
item.description: September 4th. Based on EmberCN's monitoring, an institution has accumulated as many as 191,000 AAVE tokens, which are worth $61.03 million, through multiple CEXs in the past 3 weeks. In just the past 4 days, a total of 128,905 AAVE tokens with a value of $40.83 million have been withdrawn from exchanges like Binance and OKX. The most recent withdrawal took place just 30 minutes ago.

item.title: Bitget Burned 220M $BGB($1.09B) and Locked 220M $BGB($1.09B).
item.description: In a major update for $BGB, 220M $BGB($1.09B) has been burned, and another 220M $BGB($1.09B) has been transferred to a new wallet for locking. This comes as Bitget (@bitgetglobal) and Morph(@MorphLayer) announce an exclusive strategic partnership.

item.title: Timeline: Powell Signals Rate Cut, Trump Seeks Fed Control
item.description: September 4th: Following Powell's interest rate cut signal on August 22nd, Trump aimed to exert control over the Fed with the following chronological sequence:Powell's Attitude Shift:On August 22nd, at the Jackson Hole Symposium, Powell released a "rate cut signal" by citing a "shift in the risk balance", which led to the probability of a rate cut in September rising from 75% to approximately 90%.Fed Governor Cunliffe Dismissed:On August 22nd, the same day as Powell's speech, Trump once again issued a threat to fire Fed Governor Cunliffe.On August 26th, Trump dismissed Fed Governor Cunliffe with immediate effect. A few hours later, Cunliffe responded, stating that there was no reason for his dismissal and he would not resign.On August 27th, a Fed spokesperson stated that Cunliffe still remained a Fed governor and could participate in the rate decision until a ruling was made.On August 28th, Cunliffe sued Trump over his dismissal from the Fed b

item.title: Binance Alpha's current Union (U) airdrop single address yield is approximately $31
item.description: On September 4th, based on market data, Binance Alpha has launched Union (U), and currently, U has a market capitalization of $22 million.Each eligible user can receive an airdrop of 2700 U tokens. According to the current price, the estimated airdrop value per user is around $31.
